name: Jonas Palmer

topics.topic_text: I'm not a kid! I'm ten years old!
topics.response_text: Ha ha ha. You sure are! Pip-Boy and everything, look at that!Play soundFO3 Jonas YouSureAre.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Jonas_YouSureAre.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Can it, Jonas. Where's my surprise present already?
topics.response_text: Oh, I see, now that you're ten you're all business. Well then, missy, we'd better get to it.{a bit miffed, but still warm and friendly}Play soundFO3 Jonas WellThenMissy.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Jonas_WellThenMissy.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Oh... But Dad told me it was okay to come down here.
topics.response_text: Hey, relax! I was just teasing.Play soundFO3 Jonas JustTeasing.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Jonas_JustTeasing.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Thanks a lot, Jonas. This is really cool.
topics.response_text: Hey, you don't turn 10 every day! Now go on and let me see you shoot something.Play soundFO3 Jonas DontTurn10.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Jonas_DontTurn10.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: Couldn't you get me a real gun? A BB Gun is kind of lame.
topics.response_text: Maybe so, but you still better not let the Overseer see you carrying that around. That's a real gun as far as he's concerned.{he's a bit hurt at your ingratitude}Play soundFO3 Jonas BetterNotLet.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Jonas_BetterNotLet.oggnoicon

topics.topic_text: I guess so. I'm just not that into shooting things.
topics.response_text: Oh, hey, don't worry about it. You might be surprised how much fun you can have if you give it a chance, though.Play soundFO3 Jonas DontWorryAbout.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Jonas_DontWorryAbout.oggnoicon

Oh, hey, it's Jonas. Happy birthday! Sorry I couldn't be at your party. Listen, would you put your dad on?Play soundFO3 Jonas HeyItsJonas.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Jonas_HeyItsJonas.oggnoicon

conversation.response_text: Hey doc. We're all set down here.Play soundFO3 Jonas AllSet.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Jonas_AllSet.oggnoicon

combat.response_text: Hey, shoot at the targets, okay? That's not a toy!{friendly fire}Play soundFO3 Jonas NotAToy.ogghttps://fallout.fandom.com/wiki/File:FO3_Jonas_NotAToy.oggnoicon

description:
Jonas Palmer is a 45 year-old African American Male.

Jonas Palmer is a dedicated medical technician and resident of Vault 101 in 2277. He serves as Dr. James's trusted assistant and has formed a close bond with the Lone Wanderer since childhood. His warm demeanor and professional skills make him an invaluable member of the Vault's medical staff.

Jonas Palmer's Personality: Wholesome, good-humored, and intelligent, Jonas maintains a kind and approachable demeanor. While capable of appearing stern when necessary, his sense of humor always shines through. He values friendship and loyalty, having formed strong bonds with both James and the Lone Wanderer.

Jonas Palmer's Backstory: Jonas Palmer was born and raised in Vault 101, where he showed an early aptitude for medical sciences. After completing his training, he dedicated his life to helping fellow vault dwellers. In the late 2260s, Overseer Alphonse recognized Jonas's potential and appointed him as Dr. James's assistant. Since then, Jonas has become not just a colleague but a close friend to James and a trusted figure to the Lone Wanderer, who has known him since childhood.
